 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/85tG78439EmayRhBucg3-Q/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/85tG78439EmayRhBucg3-Q/550471/9BC8682BC87E031778DD9A8799AD39A4/banner-3-73.png> 	

#BreastCancerAwareness | Early Detection Saves Lives!


Early detection of breast cancer, when it's small and hasn't spread, makes treatment more effective and increases the chances of a full recovery.

Don't let a busy schedule stand in the way of your wellbeing. Take this proactive step and visit the free and private one-on-one clinical examinations by Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Hospital in:

- d3: Oct 15 from 10am - 5pm at Meeting Room Baniyas 2&3 - 5th Floor
- HO2: Oct 30 from 10am - 5pm at Meeting Room FAAST
- HO1: Oct 31 from 10am - 5pm at Meeting Room Petra 1 - 1st Floor

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/85tG78439EmayRhBucg3-Q/544752/D56C27BE61E74C2338672A7676FD7C7F/nuggets-36.png>

COFFEE WITH MICHAEL

Secure your spot to join us!

chunks.text:
GLOWORK CAREER FAIR IN KSA

This year the Group was the golden sponsor of the Astepahead (ASA) Career Fair in KSA, where we connected with talented individuals and shared valuable insights through our career workshop and panel discussion. By providing young talents with skills, opportunities, and resources, we are investing in the leaders and innovators of tomorrow. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/85tG78439EmayRhBucg3-Q/550473/63A7DD3054D11E1B359828FE1CF47C7B/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-59.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/85tG78439EmayRhBucg3-Q/544764/EB39B07D0744F8D5D1C5EBC4205F8D57/nuggets-41.png> 	

EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT AT ILIK: PERSONALISED, PRESCRIPTION SKINCARE

Meet ilik, the personalised, prescription skincare that delivers real results. Created by dermatologists, the custom-made night cream is packed with scientifically proven, prescription ingredients that get to the root of your skin issues. Get 25% off on your first order using the code CHALHOUB. Sign up here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Filikhealth.com%25252F%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CYasmine.Uthman%252540chalhoub.com%25257C8aa1b11448c7498d615a08dcded55cfc%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638630255185840338%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253duKEP9v0LH3P4SFb7AsQRZKMVJ5QwLMHICvObbCrq%25252BdM%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWahdStGcB3b7OD9CZeAvfQn%252bjLMq1U9xfqchxYfsLeTh7FT%252bSrj1%252fynLHbxQORRzRtCAoKzDEN1VFvA%252fOwXR74d4TYUqQJqHBteMWz53Emy7fiDBSQlas%252fsEbde7LekqnzvkzW2xKXhi1R5IJbQEG%252bTy0TSnzrHse7RwO62hEm5sBPBT2e9HU%252fC7O6Nw%252f8Z9ZYRMfiV5MehVDQdtK2mLitv4yE5alkPiQbu%252f%252b1fLT7Pr&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C0c8b6ca1f97d448d2ed408dce86762d9%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638640777991240859%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=yUVYnHQDWBXIhogdGYCFV3j2TMmpn77cHLNvvM1Xxn8%3D&reserved=0> !
